column5: has anyone been to cozy camp at Ignace ONT. what was the fishing like? I guess the cabins etc are ok but im more concerned with the walleye fishing in the river.please reply.
DO A SEARCH FOR COZY CAMP AND THERE ARE SOME OLDER POSTS REGARDING THIS CAMP. I AM BOOKED INTO COZY FOR JUNE 19 - 26TH BUT I HAVE NEVER BEEN THERE EITHER.
